attributes.action: Make it illegal for an employer to demand that applicants have GCSEs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: GCSEs have been dumbed down to the point where technically they verge on worthless as a qualification. An increasing number of people are now bypassing GCSEs entirely and moving directly into higher level qualifications such as A Levels or Open University courses. However, many employers both in the public and private sector demand that applicants must have GCSEs even if they have higher level qualifications.
